bibl.title: Deissmann the Philologist.

series.title: Beihefte zur Zeitschrift für die neutestamentliche Wissenschaft und die Kunde der älteren Kirche.

bibl.note: Introduction. - Part 1. Δύο τάλαντά μοι παρέδωκας: 1. Deissmann the discoverer [see in part. pp. 48-57: Popularisation of discovery: Licht vom Osten]; - 2. Deissmann the lexicographer; - 3. Deissmann the philologist. - Part 2. Ἡ ἱερὰ μητρόπολις τῆς Ἀσίας ... ἐτείμησεν Αδολφον Δεισσμανν: 4. From the study to the realia; - 5. The Ephesus excavations. - Part 3. Deissmann in his contemporary context: 6. From postclassical Greek to Sozialpolitik; - 7. Evangelischer Wochenbrief and Protestant Weekly Letter; - 8. Ecumenical humanitarianism; - 9. From zenith to eclipse. - General conclusion. - G.A. Deissmann genealogy. - Part 4. Appendices and Addenda. Indices.
bibl.seg: GERBER Albrecht, Deissmann the Philologist. (Beihefte zur Zeitschrift für die neutestamentliche Wissenschaft und die Kunde der älteren Kirche. 171.)
Berlin - New York, de Gruyter, 2010, 8°, xxxiv-649 pp., 14 figg. ISBN 978-3-11-022431-3. €139,95.

Introduction. - Part 1. Δύο τάλαντά μοι παρέδωκας: 1. Deissmann the discoverer [see in part. pp. 48-57: Popularisation of discovery: Licht vom Osten]; - 2. Deissmann the lexicographer; - 3. Deissmann the philologist. - Part 2. Ἡ ἱερὰ μητρόπολις τῆς Ἀσίας ... ἐτείμησεν Αδολφον Δεισσμανν: 4. From the study to the realia; - 5. The Ephesus excavations. - Part 3. Deissmann in his contemporary context: 6. From postclassical Greek to Sozialpolitik; - 7. Evangelischer Wochenbrief and Protestant Weekly Letter; - 8. Ecumenical humanitarianism; - 9. From zenith to eclipse. - General conclusion. - G.A. Deissmann genealogy. - Part 4. Appendices and Addenda. Indices.
